participant_1.background: i'm in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.

participant_2.background: my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young.
